question: What was the ruling period of Vijayanagar emperor Krishna Deva Raya?
explanation: The emperor of Vijayanagar empire, Sri Krishna Devraya (1509â€“1529 AD) was the third ruler of the Tuluva Dynasty. In his reign, the Vijayanagar empire reached to its zenith in peace, order, power, prosperity and learning. He assumed the title of Yavanrayjaya Sthapancharya and was known as Andhara Bhoja or Abhinav Bhoja
